1.0.name: wordpress/acobot
1.0.description:
This plugin includes two features that work for the same purpose: Wow your website visitors and turn them into buying customers.

Smart Contact Form

Acobot plugin puts the contact form on users' figer tips by displaying a contact widget on every webpage of your WordPress. Contacting you gets so simple and easy that you will get more sales inquiries.

The more important, after customers submit the form, Acobot will immediately give accurate answers to customer questions and guide them to resolve their issues (customer support automation).

When the interaction ends, Acobot will send the customer messages and dialogs with the robot to your email box.

Live Chat Robot

You might have heard of live chat is the most powerful conversion rate optimization tool. With live chat software, you can chat with website visitors, answer their questions and help them buy.

Acobot plugin displays a chat widget on your website, behind which is an i
